publisher.publisher-name: Military Operations Research Society in cooperation with the Military Applications Society (MAS) of the Institute for Operations Research and Management Science (INFORMS)

title-group.article-title: Rule-Based Agents for Aggregate Level Simulations

bio.p: Mr Jan Frelin is an employee of the Swedish Defence Research Establishment and is currently head of the OA team at the Ground Combat Development Department of the Swedish Armed Forces. Previous work include OA assignments at the Swedish Defence Wargaming Centre, the Army Staff, the Navy Staff and the Swedish MoD. Mr Frelin has studied Computer Engineering at the Royal Institute of Technology in Stockholm, Sweden.
